A small room with someone sitting next to you... Were you saved?
12511.content:
The pressure caused by the jet passing by causes the shute to shake violently. You attempt to straighten out the canopy only to rip a quarter sized hole, this was very bad. You could no longer controll your descent as you try to slow yourself down. You manage to slow down enough to survive, but it won't be pretty. You slam side first on the concrete sending intense pain through your body. You attempt to stand as you realize you are surrounded by the bases personal. You can't even reach for your sidearm as you pass out.

You slowly awake to find yourself in_____
12511.title: your parachute is damaged? uh oh

13.content:
Name: 1st SGT Nathan Wallcroft. Coyote

Appearance: Rather short brown hair accompanied by a goatee of matching color.
Age: 31
Height: 6"
Clothing: Grey Sneak Suit, forest camouflaged Fatigues.

Background: You served as a combat engineer. You fought in combat enough times to be recognized for both your combat prowess, tactical sense, and even leadership to some extent. Your latter mercenary work showed your ability to adapt to unique climates and objectives. You were accepted into the Foxhound, then came the training which prepared you for most combat combat and survival situations.

Weapon/s: M16, SOCOM
13.title: Player 2 (name needs to be the NEXT title ! )

131.content:
You sat at a table surrounded by who you could only assume was an intel team. Soon enough Major Avery Manning entered, you snapping to attention before being told to be at ease. " Thank you all for meeting. At precisely 2300 hours Pacific Time, two days ago a mercenary force invaded Palau completely taking over the island nations capital of Ngerulmud. The local police and tactical response teams attempted to fight back, but were utterly decimated by the superior force."

The Major motioned towards the short brunette at his left. " The CIA have confirmed who the invasion was orchestrated by one Anya Vadello." The projector flicked alight showing a picture of a woman wearing rather elegant clothing, her long flowing jet black hair. She was flanked by four people in black combat gear.

The woman cleared her throat. " The four mercenary's guarding her are each Foxhound candidates. The Viper, the Hawk, the Crow, and the Bear." The Major shut off the display. " Your main objectives are capture Anya at any cost, and find out what brought her there. We can't allow her to hold the country, failure here is not an option."

How do you get to
131.title: Coyote

choices: Silently attack them one by one.
1311.content:
The roar of the ac-160's engines began to sound more like the beat of a war drum. You looked around the hull seeing the crew prepare for the worse. One of the crewman held up two fingers, you put on the oxygen mask and checked the altimeter. The crewman motioned and you approached the opening cargo door. Soon enough you had made the jump.

The wind roared around you as you plummeted through the midnight air until you pull the rip cord deploying your parachute. You landed on a small alcove before the city. You quickly take cover before turn on your codec. This is Coyote, Maj. do you copy?" The dead air ended abruptly. " Loud and clear Coyote. Were are in the darkness now, from this point on our actions could prevent a international incident. From this point on you will be speaking with Lima. Good luck."

About a second later a new voice came over the codec. " Hello Coyote, I will be your liaison for " Operation Albatross." I have a good feeling about this Coyote." The voice was clearly a womans, likely the same that gave you the debriefing those few days ago. " I would advise gaining some familiarity with your surroundings." At this point you could hear a tracking party approaching, likely mercenary's spotting your landing.

How do you react?
1311.title: By aircraft.

choices: Surely there would be a way.
13111.content:
You quickly hurry over to the nearby brush and conceal yourself. A squad of five soldiers entered the clearing and investigate. You quenched your breath as one got within three feet away from you. They all wore grey bataclava's only revealing their eyes. as well as tactical vests over simple grey fatigues. Moved silently to the tree next to you avoiding them literally walking into you.

" HQ please respond." Their was a silence as they stood at ease believeing it to be a false alarm, so to speak. " No sign of any disturbance. Maybe Oracle misread." The operator confirmed this and soon enough they disappeared as soon as they had arrived. Who or what is oracle, is that what brought them here? You carefully scalec the steep ridge giving you a decent view of the city.

You take out your binoculars and begin scanning. You watch as troop transports patroling the streets roll by. You were taken aback by a Hind gunship fly in the opposite direction. It landed on the hospital roof out of your field of view before apparently unloading and leaving.

Do you infiltrate the hospital, or wait?
13111.title: Evade detection.

131111.content:
You quickly ready your receiver. " Lima, a Hind just landed on the roof of the hospital. I need a way to get in." You hear her snicker slightly. " You don't want to use the front door I take it?.... Ok, hospital blueprints show a service tunnel nearby that should take you underneath the hospital." You wouldn't say it sounds easy, but it is preferable to being gunned down in the street. " We will monitor the oppositions radio activity. That should give you an advantage." At least you have that. You thanked Lima. " Your doing great so far, Coyote."

You stand up before checking the safety on your M16 and it's silencer, you'd hate for you to be comprised because your silencer wasn't properly attached. You find a nearby lone mercenary standing guard by the wooded area. You take your CQC stance an creep up behind him. You quickly put him in a choke hold and pull him into the brus before holding your survival knife just in front of his neck so he could feel the knife-point digging into his skin. " There's a service entrance under the hospital, were's the entrance?" He was shaking in fear. " Uhh... the overflow pipes. To the south..." It makes sense, but dangerous as it would leave you in the open as you walked through. " I told you... now let me go!" You tighten your grip as he struggles to get free only to pass out in vein. You head to the south until you found two large overflow pipes.

Inside it is pitch black. How do you navigate it?
131111.title: Infiltrate the hospital.

1311112.content: Then cyote realized he has two choices if headgear NVG's or NODS (IR Goggles). So gauging the level of darkness and guessing the level of security you choose?
1311112.title: Night Vision.

choices: Fire at him from this position.
13111122.content:
Given the long stretch of total darkness before you, in addition to the fact that traditional traps would be more difficult to spot without NVG's. you let your eyes adjust to the devices other worldly glow. The pipe is just large enough to walk slightly hunched to fit. After about fifteen minutes of walking you reached a water purification facility.

Cautiously you use the maintenance hatch to climb out. As soon as you do you hear the banter between two guards patrolling. " Did you see all those explosives that Bear brought down." The second took a drag of his cigarette before replying. " Damn, I hope he knows as much as he thinks, or were all gonna be in a tight spot." The guards finished their break and moved on. You quickly radio Lima. " Lima, the Bear anticipated me taking this route." She paused. " I see.... Here we are. Kago Attah, born in South Africa. Standing 6'4 he is known for being ferocious in combat. He was in the South African Defense Forse and became adept with explosives. He usually wields a MGL-140 as well as a G3A3. Be careful."

You cautiouslly walk down the halls out of a room to your left a guards walk out instantly spot you, which is simple since your standing a foot away. You react by fireing at their chests, they both dropped to the floor. You run your hand over your short hair, you quickly hide their bodys in a storage room.

Now more alert you creep into a large roadway. You see someone fire a grenade to your right. You get behind a concrete barrier as the grenade shrapnel fly around you.

You peek out to see the Bear standing with his grenade launcher resting on his shoulder. He wore a slimmed down black EOD suit, his helmet's visor was tinted silver hiding his face. " Just you and me now. Don't worry, no need to bury you body after I'm through." He taunted as floodlight turned on to illuminate the corridor.

Bruit force will only get you killed. What do you do?
13111122.title: NVG'S -simply seeing in the dark

choices: Leave and sneak by the Guards (extra soldiers to worry about)
131111221.content:
Cyote: (time to give him a run for his money

He tosses up a smoke and concussion grenade at once,shuts his eyes/Holds his ears

he starts running and before he is almost out of sight he tosses a frag just as the smoke is half gone and ducks into a door nearby and shuts it quick.

5

4

3

2

1

Boom!!!

the frag goes off and cyote halls ass to a semi-safe place and finds a spot to hide under and waits as this alert theme comes on all around him https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xWMpeBSx...

as he receeds into the air duct to wait from a slighly harder to see point of view he crawl around for 2 mins

and then this theme comes on https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SIS1Sc6U...

as he decides what to do next he finnally decides on
131111221.title: Toss a smoke grenade.

choices: Sneak away ( This might result in him finding you later.)
1311112211.content:
You find a small opening and peer out hopefull to see the Bear dead. The large man made a sound of annoyance as he brushed the shrapnel from his protective suit before rolling his shoulder to relive the pain. " Was that all?" He pulled out his shotgun as he walked to the barrier that you had previously been taking cover behind, and pointed it over the makeshift shield before he slammed his fist on said object. " Damn! Where did you go? No matter, I don't have to see you to kill you!" He Started placing Claymores. He clearly is beginning to get careless, he might make a mistake.

You could try to escape, but the Bear would without a doubt try to track you down, possibly with rest of his comrades. What do you do?
1311112211.title: Continue throught the ducts?

choices: the bear is alone and no where to be seen (he's gonna pull a liquid snake MGS1)
13111122111.content:
cyote makes a split-second descision (silences his handgun) he fires at one of the Bear's claymores as he's placing it and the Shotgun-like explosive misfires (backwards) and blasts his face,

while stunned you get to him and hold him up with a knife (like big Boss in MGS3)

his comrades (not listening) to his screams of pain and Hold your fire

RIDDLE HIM into swiss cheese with thier Ak-47's......ha falls to the floor as you throw a flash-bang and Quickly Knock out the standing guards and escape

Bear:......Cough.....I'll GET THAT...COUGh....BASTARD

you will fight him again later
13111122111.title: Neutralize him now.

choices: She's alone now, it may be the only opening like this.
131111221112.content:
You quickly took one of the unconscious mercenary's and quickly take his armor putting it over yours as well as putting on the mask. You looked identical to the others now. As soon as you hide the unconscious guard another group of men come into view.

They questioned you but were more preoccupied with helping the near death Bear. They made a makeshift stretcher and rolled him back down the caverns and into a service elevator. After a long ride you reach the floor they were using as a personal medical facility.

You followed the group to where the leaders were standing in-front of a window. Inside a few medics wheeled in the heavily wounded Bear. This gave you a chance to see the other three. The Crow, the team leader wore a gas mask the eye lenses tented a crimson color, a black tactical helmet with a yellow stripe in the middle of the helmet that extended from front to back. He carried a silenced mp5, an identical handgun to your own on his side, and lastly a combat knife in his tactical vest. He was about your own height.

Standing behind him were the Hawk and Viper. The Hawk wore a tactical helmet with a single goggle over his left eye, he wore a black bandana around his mouth. He carried a DSR-1. He was taller than you by a slight bit. And finally the Viper who you didn't know much about him, he was short only standing 5'4 at most and wearing a urban hood which covered his head and body, though you couldn't see his face. The only visible weapons you could see were two twelve inch blades on either hip.

After a few minutes none other than Anya entered as one medic exited and walked up to her. " He's stabilized. He has a punctured lung, his leg is fractured as well. We can save him, but he won't be nearly combat ready." Anya sighed heavily at the news " very well, do what you can." Her heavy British accent rang out as she looked up at Crow. " This doesn't happen again, am I clear?" He nodded " Yes mam, it won't. Bear underestimated Coyote, I'll see to it that it won't." Anya glared at you before turning on her heel and walking down the hall way. Her sharp footsteps echoing as she walked away.

Do you follow her?
131111221112.title: Blending in.

choices: You wake up in a cell.
1311112211121.content:
You followed Anya down the hall before ducking into an empty room quickly taking off your heavy disguise to ease stealth. As you step out a hand quickly grabs your rifle and disarms you. You shove the assailant away and enter the cqc stance. Your opponent is none other than The Viper.

( This is the background music. http://youtu.be/kSA4U4jNq4E )The Viper lunges at you attempting to stab you with either blade. You step to the right and attempt to grab his arm only to be kicked in the chest as the agile assassin uses the momentum to do a backflip, using you as a springboard.

As he attacks again you prepare yourself and block before grabbing the small figure and tossing them. As the assassin landed the hood fell back shocking you, Viper is no man. She appeared to be in her mid twenty's with her long auburn hair tied in a neat pony tail, her jade green eyes reading you.

You were barely noticed as a great force plowed into you, forcing you to the ground. It was the Crow tackling you to the ground. The Hawk aiming at you from a distance with a scorpion sub machine gun. You barely were able to stand as Crow knees you in the gut, forcing you to your own knees. " Good fight Coyote, luckily Anya wants you alive." Before you could react he slams the butt of his weapon on the top of your head, knocking you out.

What happens next?
1311112211121.title: She's alone now, it may be the only opening...

13111122111211.content:
are we going to do an MGS3 torture cell thingy?

or an MGS1 Torture bed-Shocky?
13111122111211.title: You wake up in a cell.

choices: Your being taken back for more interrogation.
131111221112111.content:
You awoke slowly with pain on the spot where you were struck. You couldn't see anything due to the dark confines of the room. Each of your limbs were cuffed to a metal chair to prevent you from escaping. Soon enough the lights flicked on revealing you were in a windowless room. Soon enough your captors entered the room.

Anya was the first to walk up to you with Crow standing behind her, towering over her slender frame. " Well Coyote, it seems your skill, or luck has faltered. Regardless you were most impressive at evading detection, improvising, disguising yourself." She counted on her fingers as she walked around you, her heels clacking.

" Oh, and nearly killing the Bear. Now what I can't figure is what your here for." She stared directly into your eyes, a smile of satisfaction on her face." What is your mission here?" Your only response is grinning right back at her. She slowly stood back up before stepping back. " Make him talk Commander. Just don 't kill him, not yet."

Crow moves about the room getting prepared to interrogate you. He retrieved two buckets of water, a rag, a nightstick, and his combat knife. Both the Viper and Hawk were standing by in case he asked theme to join in.

Anya tapped her foot " How did you arrive, by what means." You lie saying by submarine. " What fools do you take us for?" She nodded at Crow who jabbed you in the stomach with the knightstick before brutally slamming it on your back. You cough and sputter as Anya waits for an answer. You give none.

" Very well, what do you have in ways of reinforcements?" You lie once again. The crow places his knife at your fingertips before sticking it under your middle fingers nail. The pain was intense making you feel that would cut clear through, before this he pulls it out again and repeats the process with every finger. You say nothing.

Anya getting frustrated turns to walk out. " I have work to do. Punish him." Crow kicks you in the stomach causing the chair to slam on it's back. He proceeded to place the rag over your face and steadily poured the water over the cloth. It went on for a minute before he removed it to prevent you from blacking out. He repeats this four more times. You weren't sure how much longer you could keep this up, luckily Crow tires of this and orders guards to toss you into a holding sell in the police station.

The guards tossed you onto the bed and left. " Keep an eye on him." Your torturer told Viper before leaving. You lied their racked with pain, your fingertips bleed, your back is twitching in pain from the beating, and you were on the brink of passing out.

You noticed the Viper looking at you with sympathy in her eye's. She quickly turns around to hide her expression. As you tried to fight the feeling of sleep creeping, you noticed the woman singing quietly to herself , or you possibly. ( Her singing: http://youtu.be/w9pXsWlDi7k ) You no longer fight it and close your eyes.

You awake with a jolt hours later. What's happening?
131111221112111.title: Interrogation.

choices: Down the manhole! Mgs3 (base escape) (think of the SORROW)
1311112211121111.content:
as they haul him to his feet he stomps one of the guards foot and bashes the back of his head into the other

after jumping at a window he lands in the next corridor, he makes a break for it

you head for the road
1311112211121111.title: Your being taken back for more interrogation.

choices: She steps out of the way.
13111122111211111.content:
You pick up the guards M16 and m9 handgun.You run to the right as you reach a side exit, only one thing stopped you Viper. The woman stood in front of you looking back at you. Expected her to attack, but there's a silence. You can hear the guards scrounging for you, you can't afford to stand here.

Dose she attack you?
13111122111211111.title: Down the manhole! Mgs3 (base escape) (think of ...

choices: Hit-go meet The Sorrow (cyote's version) you get moved away from them by viper
Miss and you run to safety
131111221112111111.content: well does she hit you or does she miss on purpose?
131111221112111111.title: Yes.

1311112211121111112.content:
Viper drew her knives in a smooth motion. " They have cameras watching us." You understood what she meant as she charged at you, you move your body to the left as you hear a loud " clank!" As the blades struck the wall behind you. You toss her to the ground as softly as you can while still getting away with looking authentic. You take the chance dashing out the door.

It was evening time as the cool air reinvigorates you. This is quickly quaffed by the intense fighting into the streets. The local resistance was engaging the guards. " Quickly, through here" You follow the voice to a man opening a manhole. You cover them as new mercenary's appeared. They were different, they all looked identical each wearing urban camouflaged light body armor, and helmets with visors which hide their faces, each wore an insignia on their left arms.They were brutally efficient as the resistance forces began being utterly decimated by these new troops. As much as you didn't want to you were forced to leave the fight and enter the manhole cover.

They sealed the manhole with a blow torch as the others just walked on. These troops wore scavenged body armor, as for weapons they carried hunting shotguns, civilian handguns, hunting riffles, and the lucky had scavenged military grade weapons. You stopped the man who called out to you. " Those me that just attacked, I've never seen them before. Who were they?" The man took a long drag from a cigaret. " X-ray units. Men picked by the Crow for his personal units. They were the ones that massacred the police. You must have really pissed them off if they sent X-ray's after you."

You turn on your radio and tuned it then waited for Lima to reply. " Lima, the Viper let me escape. Do you have any idea why?" Their was a typing sound before she replied. " That's.... unexpected. Here we are, Keira Stokes, age 26, height 5,4, she was born in the US. Orphaned by the age of eight she enlisted in the US Air force on her eighteenth birthday reportedly to get away from her foster family. She left after her first contract ran out and became a mercenary. Although she mostly took jobs that didn't require her to kill. Not much other than that, Sorry."

As she spoke the line made a sharp noise and switched frequency's " Coyote, this is Dr. Harlen Wade. I am the pioneer, so to speak of Project Oracle. Anya took the decoy which I bugged allowing yourself to arrive. Unfortunately they have discovered this. I need your help, I have received intel from an internal leak that they will attack my current location. I am in my office at the top of the ATC (Athena Technology Corporation) building. My security team will fight them off as long as possible, but they can't hold them off for long. Please hurry."

What should you do?
1311112211121111112.title: Miss and you run to safety

choices: the doc is hiding pretty well (get to her with no fighting)
the doc is about to be found (expect small encounter if you leave quick enough)
13111122111211111121.content:
you checked your guns and swapped them out for a .45 they had and they had a makeshift silencer! (last about 16 shots before it breaks)

you also got a combat knife and a flash bang

as you started heading to the doctor you noticed that they were not actively shooting

why was that cyote wondered

1312.title: By submarine.

choices: Get in touch with his liaison.
13122.content:
The small craft launched at a safe speed as all Coyote could here was the sound of water attempting to crack through the hull. Soon enough the sound of the craft reaching the insertion point. You slowly check over your gear as you move up the beachhead. The devastated city reminded Coyote of Europe in the Second World War. The sound of weapon fire cackling in the city told the story.

What would Coyote do?
13122.title: GREAT LAUNCH

info.description: In this MGS title you are one of many trained to replace solid snake so you! and whoever else writes in this will start their own likenss (describe themselves and what they look like) plus you have the same gear as snake but you get to pick any two colors on light one dark of your choice [remeber this is you! so whatever your like this guy must be the same or very similar!] okay? girls are allowed just model yourself after what you think snake would look like * but i'd prefer if girls model themselves after already existing female characters good or bad as long as you play fair enough that others can beat you if they do the right thing.
info.pretty_title: Metal Gear Solid (The New Fox Hound)
